description: User adoption analysis involves understanding how and why users engage with a product or service. It helps identify barriers to adoption and areas for improvement to enhance user experience and retention.
you_have_this_if: You notice a decline in user engagement over time.
Users provide feedback indicating confusion or frustration with the product.
You have low conversion rates from trial to paid users.
User demographics suggest a mismatch with your target audience.
You are launching a new feature and want to ensure it meets user needs.

approaches.best_for: When designing chatbots for younger audiences or conducting user research on technology adoption.
approaches.key_tradeoff: Provides insights into user motivations but may require extensive user research.

decision_matrix.best_when: You need to understand user motivations and barriers to adoption for a specific demographic.

start_here: Start with the User Motivation Assessment Framework as it provides a structured approach to understanding user needs and motivations, which is crucial for improving adoption rates.
